thread.title: The top 10 songs and albums on the iTunes Store
thread.title_full: The top 10 songs and albums on the iTunes Store

title: The top 10 songs and albums on the iTunes Store
text:
The top 10 songs and albums on the iTunes Store   2:03   2:03 PM EDT 
iTunes' Official Music Charts for the week ending Oct. 22, 2015: 
Top Songs 
3. Wildest Dreams, Taylor Swift 
4. The Hills, The Weeknd 
5. Stitches, Shawn Mendes 
6. Downtown (feat. Eric Nally, Melle Mel, Kool Moe Dee & Grandmaster Caz) - Single, Macklemore & Ryan Lewis 
7. What Do You Mean?, Justin Bieber 
8. Ex's & Oh's, Elle King 
9. Same Old Love, Selena Gomez 
10. Like I'm Gonna Lose You (feat. John Legend), Meghan Trainor 
Top Albums 
1. Purpose (Deluxe), Justin Bieber 
2. Pentatonix , Pentatonix 
4. Made In The A.M., One Direction 
5. General Admission, Machine Gun Kelly 
6. The Documentary 2.5, The Game 
7. Death Of A Bachelor, Panic! At the Disco 
8. What a Time To Be Alive,Drake & Future 
9. Beauty Behind the Madness, The Weeknd 
10. 1989, Taylor Swift
